messages.msgSnippet: ... I wonder if any of the good unschooling books are available as books on tape yet. Tia No one can make you feel inferior without your consent. Eleanor

>
>Hey, thanks for the suggestion Marge. As a matter of fact we will be taking

>from NM to MS next month. I'll have to load up with ammunition, er..., I

Eleanor Roosevelt

messages.subject: Educating husbands
messages.msgSnippet: ... not ... all ... I ... Hey, thanks for the suggestion Marge. As a matter of fact we will be taking a very long trip in the car, with him driving most of the
messages.messageBody:
>Date: Fri, 19 Apr 2002 01:35:23 EDT
> From: MBYeager@...
>Subject: Re: Educating husbands Digest Number 318

>In a message dated 4/18/2002 7:36:13 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
>truealaskans@... writes:

>> If anyone knows of any short articles about unschooling that
>> may be helpful, I could probably get him to read something short. Just
not
>> an entire book. :-)

>Do you ever travel distances in the car with him driving? My dh learned
all
>about extended breastfeeding, immersion parenting, homelearning and more as
I
>read passages to him of the books I was reading! ;-> Best wishes on it --

>Marge in CA


Hey, thanks for the suggestion Marge. As a matter of fact we will be taking
a very long trip in the car, with him driving most of the way, when we move
from NM to MS next month. I'll have to load up with ammunition, er..., I
mean reading material. I get a little car sick if I read in the car very
long though. But I will do my best.

Thanks,
Suzanna
